divs: Sighting Details I cannot remember the Exact date, I am close if not correct Dec 11 or 12th 2:02 A.M. -Weather -cloudy? (no stars visible) Ok first of all I have No Idea what this "thing" "was" that I saw, Just seeing it made me feel confused,Because it was 2 A.M.!! I was on my 15 min cigarette break at work, and where I work u are not allowed to smoke on campus so u have to drive out off grounds so Im driving to the smoking area which is just a few turns,curves and a little stretch of road, While I was driving.. to my right there is a big field with tree lines pretty far back.While driving On the tree line was this round orange glow, I was like?? Sun? Moon? and like questioning my thinking like duh no its not the sun!! its 2a.m. and I was thinking it was just the moon..and in the back of my mind thinking I never saw an orange moon in Dec or yet as much one that low that big this time in the morning..So I got to the smoking area.and from there this object" I thought was the moon . or had myself convinced was the moon was not visible. I parked, had my cigarette break usually 15mins. Drove back down that very same road.still kind of intrigued and fascinated by the color of this object, which I dismissed as a "moon"On the way back T object was no longer there. I went inside and told my co-workers about what I saw and that it was probrably just the moon. (The very next night) I went on my cigarette break @ 2- A.M. it was a clear night. I looked out into the field and tree line to see if I could see anything similar to what I had seen the previous night.I didn't..... What I did see .... I looked "UP" and out my cardoor window and I seen the Moon ! It was a clear bright night and there were stars.the moon was defnately not orange, Nor was it anywhere close to where the object I seen the night before was. And it was bigger than the moon was.. So I guess I just wanna know if anyone knows what I may have seen or..if it could be anything of significance. Thank You for Listening.
Summary: Visual of a round very illuminated orange glow 2 a.m.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Logansport
There were no other sightings in Logansport on or around December 12th 2008
